participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

socialdev_cfbc_01.Description: The staff was helpful and nice. | 1 = Yes; 0=  No; 98=  I don't know

socialdev_cfbc_02.Description: The staff told me about the study before we started. | 1 = Yes; 0=  No; 98=  I don't know

socialdev_cfbc_03.Description: When I filled out the questionnaire  I could ask a staff member to help me. | 1 = Yes; 0=  No; 98=  I don't know

socialdev_cfbc_04.Description: I understood all the questions. | 1 = Yes; 0=  No; 98=  I don't know

socialdev_cfbc_05.Description: There were many difficult words. | 1 = Yes; 0=  No; 98=  I don't know

socialdev_cfbc_06.Description: We had to wait for a long time before we got started. | 1 = Yes; 0=  No; 98=  I don't know

socialdev_cfbc_07.Description: Some of the questions made me uncomfortable. | 1 = Yes; 0=  No; 98=  I don't know

socialdev_cfbc_08.Description: I felt comfortable in the interview room. | 1 = Yes; 0=  No; 98=  I don't know

socialdev_cfbc_09.Description: I felt comfortable with the staff person interviewing me. | 1 = Yes; 0=  No; 98=  I don't know

socialdev_cfbc_10.Description: I would recommend this study to friends and family. | 1 = Yes; 0=  No; 98=  I don't know

socialdev_cfbc_11.Description: I think this study took too long. | 1 = Yes; 0=  No; 98=  I don't know

socialdev_cfbc_12.Description: The day was difficult because I did 2 studies. | 1 = Yes; 0=  No; 98=  I don't know

socialdev_cfbc_13.Description: I prefer to do the 2 studies on different days. | 1 = Yes; 0=  No; 98=  I don't know

socialdev_cfbc_14.Description: I think the $40 I received was a good compensation for my time. | 1 = Yes; 0=  No; 98=  I don't know

socialdev_cfbc_15.Description: I would participate in this study or similar studies again. | 1 = Yes; 0=  No; 98=  I don't know
